definition: there is no harm in/might as well
to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm

sentences.english: If you don't like the weather at front window, see the weather at back window. (
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜欢前窗的天气，不妨看看后窗的。

sentences.english: It won't hurt to postpone the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 不妨把开会时间往后延。

sentences.english: Just read Leeao's book " The True Face of Chen Shui Bian" you will be enlightened.
sentences.chinese: 不妨读读李敖的《陈水扁真面目》，你将会茅塞顿开。

sentences.english: so I might as well keep going with it, you know.
sentences.chinese: 所以我不妨继续做下去看看。

sentences.english: You might think over the matter at your leisure.
sentences.chinese: 你闲下来不妨想想那件事。

sentences.english: That was, so to speak , another gift from Warley.
sentences.chinese: 这不妨说是沃莱送给我的又一件礼物。

sentences.english: Keep going backwards until you get to the first step.
sentences.chinese: 不妨在你踏出第一步的时候方向思考思考。

sentences.english: If you don't receive an answer quickly, give them a prod.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不能很快得到答复，不妨催他们一下。

sentences.english: Spend time sorting out your dreams if you remember them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你还记得自己做过的梦，不妨花些时间进行梳理。

sentences.english: Why would anyone bottle water, Mrs. C? You might as well try to sell air.
To give your enthusiasm a push in the right direction, refer to your notebook when the spiral is collapsing in on itself.
sentences.chinese: 当热忱的螺旋转错方向时，不妨回顾一下你的记事簿。

sentences.english: I don't mind doing you a favour that costs me nothing.
You might as well try to sell air.
Aquatic Form is now offered by druid trainers at level 16.
sentences.chinese: 水栖形式不妨在16级时间接从锻练师处练习。

sentences.english: If you will put up with my atrocious pronunciation, I would like to read you a few pages of your ancestor's work.
sentences.chinese: 如果您能忍受我糟糕透顶的发音，咱们不妨念几页。

sentences.english: If you do not receive an answer quickly , give them a prod.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不能很快得到答复，不妨催他们一下。

definition: to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
